pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions for Calculating Dodge Romig, MIL STD 105E and MIL STD 414 Acceptance Sampling Plan // Calculates an acceptance sampling plan, (sample size and acceptance number) based in MIL STD 105E, Dodge Romig and MIL STD 414 tables and procedures. The arguments for each function are related to lot size, inspection level and quality level. The specific plan operating curve (OC), is calculated by the binomial distribution.
